movies.plot: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.
movies.title: Dracula

movies.plot: An architect senses impending doom as his half-remembered recurring dream turns into reality. The guests at the country house encourage him to stay as they take turns telling supernatural tales.
movies.title: Dead of Night

movies.plot: A scientist becomes murderous after discovering, and being exposed to the radiation of, a powerful new element called Radium X.
movies.title: The Invisible Ray

movies.plot: A young Canadian nurse (Betsy) comes to the West Indies to care for Jessica, the wife of a plantation manager (Paul Holland). Jessica seems to be suffering from a kind of mental paralysis ...
movies.title: I Walked with a Zombie

movies.plot: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.
movies.title: Dracula

movies.plot: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.
movies.title: Cat People
